com.foreach.across.modules.dynamicforms.domain.document.data

Interface DynamicDocumentFieldAccessor<T>


  • public interface DynamicDocumentFieldAccessor<T>
    Single field accessor, wraps a DynamicDocumentFieldDefinition together with a data accessor for retrieving the actual value, setting or deleting it.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Object delete()
      Delete the field (if possible).
      boolean exists()
      Does the actual field already exist? It's possible that the field has a null value set, but this will return false if for example a parent field does not yet exist.
      T get()
      Get the field value, don't create the default if the field does not yet exist.
      Object getDefaultValue()
      Get the default value registered for this field.
      DynamicDocumentFieldAccessor getFieldAccessor(String fieldPath)
      Get an accessor for a child field.
      DynamicDocumentFieldDefinition getFieldDefinition() 
      String getFieldPath() 
      org.springframework.core.convert.TypeDescriptor getFieldType() 
      T getOrCreate()
      Get the field value and if the field does not yet exist, create and set the default value.
      void initialize()
      Initialize this field with its default value.
      void recalculate()
      Update the calculated value of this field or any of its children.
      Object set(Object value)
      Set the field value.

    • Method Detail

      • getFieldPath

        String getFieldPath()
        Returns:
        the unique path to the specific field in the document

      • getFieldDefinition

        DynamicDocumentFieldDefinition getFieldDefinition()
        Returns:
        the full field definition for this field

      • getFieldType

        org.springframework.core.convert.TypeDescriptor getFieldType()
        Returns:
        the field type descriptor, only values matching the given type will be accepted by set(Object)

      • set

        Object set(Object value)
        Set the field value. Return any previously set value.

      • get

        T get()
        Get the field value, don't create the default if the field does not yet exist.

      • getDefaultValue

        Object getDefaultValue()
        Get the default value registered for this field. This does apply the default value nor make any modifications to the field itself. The default value can be retrieved even if exists() is false.

      • getOrCreate

        T getOrCreate()
        Get the field value and if the field does not yet exist, create and set the default value. Mainly used for intermediate paths.

      • delete

        Object delete()
        Delete the field (if possible). Return the deleted value.

      • exists

        boolean exists()
        Does the actual field already exist? It's possible that the field has a null value set, but this will return false if for example a parent field does not yet exist.

        Note that if there is no field definition, an accessor will never be created. So this method can be used to check if a field instance exists, but you can always be sure the field instance is creatable if it does not exist yet.

      • recalculate

        void recalculate()
        Update the calculated value of this field or any of its children. This method might have no impact at all if the field does not have a formula.

      • initialize

        void initialize()
        Initialize this field with its default value.

      • getFieldAccessor

        DynamicDocumentFieldAccessor getFieldAccessor(String fieldPath)
        Get an accessor for a child field. Depending on the type of field a different type of field accessor might be returned. A field that does not exist will result in an exception being thrown.

        The path is expected to be the suffix without the current field id.

        Parameters:
        fieldPath - field identifier
        Returns:
        accessor
